name: tavily-search
description: An MCP server for Tavily's search & news API, with explicit site inclusions/exclusions

examples.title: Regular Web Search
examples.description: Perform a standard web search using Tavily's capabilities.
examples.prompt: Tell me about Anthropic's newly released MCP protocol

examples.title: Domain Filtering Report
examples.description: Generate a report filtering specific domains.
examples.prompt: Tell me about redwood trees. Please use MLA format in markdown syntax and include the URLs in the citations. Exclude Wikipedia sources.

examples.title: Direct Answer Search
examples.description: Use answer search mode for getting direct answers.
examples.prompt: I want a concrete answer backed by current web sources: What is the average lifespan of redwood trees?

examples.title: News Search
examples.description: Retrieve recent news articles on specific topics.
examples.prompt: Give me the top 10 AI-related news in the last 5 days.

TAVILY_API_KEY.description: Your Tavily API key for accessing Tavily's search API functionalities.
